name: Super tux fan made DEMO
description:
the Linux version IS A APPIMAGE!

How to run?

1 download it and go to the Files app on the taskbar.

2 Find a file callled game-linux-AppImage.

3 Click the file ONCE then right click on the file.

4 Go to properties

5 Click permissions

6 Check the "Allow executing file as program"

7 Click close

8 then double click the appimage!
